name: df-hash
body: |- wceq(chash, cun(ccom(cres(crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), nat0), com), ccrd), cxp(cdif(universe, cfn), csn(cpnf))))
comment: Define the set size function ` # ` , which gives the cardinality of a finite set as a member of ` NN0 ` , and assigns all infinite sets the value ` +oo ` . For example, ` ( # `` { 0 , 1 , 2 } ) = 3 ` ( ~ ex-hash ). (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 22-Jun-2011.)
